Package inria.util

Interface Summary
EventHandler  
LoggerInterface logger interface methods.
 

Class Summary
ByteArray The ByteArray class represents an array of bytes for fast access in networking packages.
Entity an entity is anything identified by an interger ID.
EntityTable EntityTable contains a set of entities indexed by ID.
EventManager This implements an event manager for timer events.
FIFOQueue This class implements the first in first out queue.
Logger This class provides a flexible log mechanism.
NTP Translate UNIX time to NTP time.
Utilities Static methods providing common utilities.
